about__txt:
I'm a very social and technology aware person.
I love to contribute to multiple open-source projects to keep my mind fresh & learn new things.

experience__wwa__txt: I automated tasks of engineers, that otherwise would have been done manually. This way they could focus on what really mattered!
experience__inf__txt: I completely revamped an old web application from AngularJS to Angular 14. This way the application was more maintainable and scalable.
